articles.title: Eight Things to Know for Cookie Run: Kingdom's Update - IGN SOUTH EAST ASIA
articles.description: Cookie Run: Kingdom is a mobile base-building RPG that offers a sheet pan of over 64 unique characters on fresh adventures. Led by fearless leader GingerBrave, these tough Cookies explore over 250 story levels where they build delicious strongholds, fight for…
